title: ETree
summary: Watch as a Electronic Tree grows as fully animated watch face unique to Wear.
description: ETree (Fractal Tree) watch face is a very unique and easy to use digital watch face designed for Android Wear. It is a one of a kind watch face, completely unique in its creation of a Fractal Tree, using the process of recursion with random values meaning each and every time it will be different from the last, with billions of possibilities.  This is no animated gif, but a true uniquely created fractal each and every time a it is created.Now re-sized to fit all watch resolutions both round and square.You can customize the watch face to either have a black and white tree with leaves, or a colored tree with leave and different colored fruit.You can even swap the seconds in the digital layout to show the battery status and have everything you need on the screen when you need it.Ambient mode is supported on both the ambient mode style watches. The Asus Zen will show a black and white pixel ambient mode, whilst other watches will show a black and white dimmed mode for battery saving.Key featuresAll settings are available using the Android Wear companion app (only).✔ Two animations to choose from✔ Two fonts to choose from, modern and themed✔ Custom colors for the Digital Time.✔ Works for round and square watches✔ Optional digital clock (24 hour or 12 hour, seconds are optional)✔ Watch battery indicator✔ Date indicator ✔Is not affected by the Moto flat tire✔Settings are accessed via Android Wear App, just tap on the cogwheel on the watch face.FAQ!! Please contact me if you have any trouble with or any question regarding the app !!yelladev@gmail.comIf you have any problems with the performance of the watch face please email the developer directly at yelladev@gmail.com, with a break down of the problem and a screen shot of the watch battery stats, so the issue can be looked into with more detail, thank you (please do not use the comments to post bugs or performance bugs).To install the watch face1. After install run 'Resync app' on Android Wear App.2. Long press your android wear watch and choose Fractal Tree as your watch face, or select the watch face using the Android Wear app.Compatible with all Android Wear devices on Android Wear 5+.
descriptionHTML:
ETree (Fractal Tree) watch face is a very unique and easy to use digital watch face designed for Android Wear. It is a one of a kind watch face, completely unique in its creation of a Fractal Tree, using the process of recursion with random values meaning each and every time it will be different from the last, with billions of possibilities. This is no animated gif, but a true uniquely created fractal each and every time a it is created.

Now re-sized to fit all watch resolutions both round and square.

You can customize the watch face to either have a black and white tree with leaves, or a colored tree with leave and different colored fruit.

You can even swap the seconds in the digital layout to show the battery status and have everything you need on the screen when you need it.

Ambient mode is supported on both the ambient mode style watches. The Asus Zen will show a black and white pixel ambient mode, whilst other watches will show a black and white dimmed mode for battery saving.

Key features
All settings are available using the Android Wear companion app (only).
✔ Two animations to choose from
✔ Two fonts to choose from, modern and themed
✔ Custom colors for the Digital Time.
✔ Works for round and square watches
✔ Optional digital clock (24 hour or 12 hour, seconds are optional)
✔ Watch battery indicator
✔ Date indicator
✔Is not affected by the Moto flat tire
✔Settings are accessed via Android Wear App, just tap on the cogwheel on the watch face.

FAQ
!! Please contact me if you have any trouble with or any question regarding the app !!
yelladev@gmail.com

If you have any problems with the performance of the watch face please email the developer directly at yelladev@gmail.com, with a break down of the problem and a screen shot of the watch battery stats, so the issue can be looked into with more detail, thank you (please do not use the comments to post bugs or performance bugs).

To install the watch face
1. After install run 'Resync app' on Android Wear App.
2. Long press your android wear watch and choose Fractal Tree as your watch face, or select the watch face using the Android Wear app.

Compatible with all Android Wear devices on Android Wear 5+.
comments: Decided to give this another try.. Battery life is much improved but still uses about 3% per hour which is still quite excessive
Love it! Fast response from dev regarding an issue I was having... Absolutely love this watch face.
Awesome! Love the design. My favorite watch face. Quick response from developer too.

Love the details The fruit is a very nice addition.  Could you maybe make it so that we can color our own fruit? Maybe implement a color wheel? (Could also be used for the text and the tree) That would be even more awesome!
Its a keeper Very different then the rest. Works great and looks even better.
recentChanges: V19 - Sorry for the quick update from v18. Tweaked the tree creation by more quickly moving between the transitions.  Also completing the move from the old name to the new name of the Watch Face  (eTree).
